saao/saa15/P334540
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}LUGAL-IGI.LAL-a-ni lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ DI-mu a-na {URU}bir-te {LU₂}kal-da-a.a šu-u li-ša₂-nu ina {URU}la-rak-ka {1}x+x-ha-a.a-u₂ is-sap-ra {URU}la-rak-ka-a.a i-ṣab-tu-ni-šu₂ ina IGI-ia na-ṣu-ni-šu a-sa-ʾa-al-šu₂ muk ša a-a-ka₂ at-ta ma-a DUMU-KA₂.DINGIR.RA{KI} a-na o {URU}la-rak-ka is-sap-ra-ni ma-a {LU₂}pa-ri-ṣu šu-tu₂ ma-a i-sa-na-li ma-a a-ni-ni o nu-da-šu ma-a EN.LIL₂{KI}-a.a x x x an-nu-rig ina IGI LUGAL EN-ia₂ u₂-ba-lu-ni-šu₂ LUGAL be-li₂ liš-ʾa-al-šu₂ a-na-ku a-sa-ʾa-al-šu₂ muk DUMU-{1}NUMUN-i a.a-ka ma-a ina {URU}hi-u₂-ri ša {KUR}pu-qu-di ša₂-ki-ni x {LU₂}SANGA ša {URU}u₂-ṣur-{d}IM re-ha-a-te ša IGI DINGIR-MEŠ na-a-ṣa ina IGI LUGAL EN-ia₂ it-tal-ka
